title: Simulation/VR-Based Customized Education Program for Elementary English Grammar Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A practice-centered program for pre-service teachers to enhance their competency in teaching elementary English grammar. It involves repeated performance of grammar test assessments by simulating real classroom scenarios in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate across seven grammar domains (modal verbs, verbs, pronouns, prepositions, nouns, adjectives, and adverbs).
Learners demonstrate problem-solving skills to correct grammar errors within three attempts in VR simulations.
Learners can analyze peer learnersâ€™ grammar errors and create customized feedback reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
